Service Details: KidSport West Kelowna is the local chapter of KidSport Canada that provides grants to individual athletes whose families cannot afford sport registration fees and would otherwise not be able to participate in a season of sport
Eligibility: Ages: 18 year(s) and under- An adult sponsor, (parent, guardian, counsellor, coach, friend), other than the Reference, must initiate the application on behalf of the child - Adult Sponsors cannot be associated with the Sport Organization - The adult sponsor fills out sections 1 to 3 and passes the application to a Financial Verification Reference - It is the responsibility of the adult sponsor to ensure the application is complete and submitted to KidSport   ** preference is given to first-time applicants **
How to Apply: - Each Calendar year, only one application for one eligible sport, may be submitted - Applications must be received prior to at the beginning the requested season of sport
